dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement (Ms. Pac-Man)
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Hideki Yoshimoto [mailto:hideki@namcobandaigames.com] 
Sent: Monday, May 21, 2007 6:03 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement (Ms. Pac-Man)

 

May 21, 2007

VIA E-MAIL: copyright@theplanet.com

 

Attn. Mr. George Poletes

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Dear Sirs:

 

I am an authorized representative of NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc., Namco Bandai Games
America Inc., Namco America Inc. and Namco Networks America Inc. ("Namco"), which
publish certain proprietary interactive games for video game consoles, personal
computers, handheld devices and the Internet.

 

I am providing this letter of notification pursuant to the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act and 17 USC
